Class NVDobject

  • java.lang.Object
    • NVDobject
  • public class NVDobject
extends java.lang.Object
    This class' purpose is to connect all methods that put various objects into database so that the needed operation will be executed
    Author:
    Tomas Bozek (XarfNao)

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      static boolean db_exists  
      static boolean db_extended

      Constructor Description
      NVDobject()  

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      static void basicDatabase​(java.lang.String cpe_file, java.lang.String[] cve_files)
      This method's purpose is to put all given CVE and CPE objects and related objects into database It uses the basicDBcore() method for this purpose
      static void basicDBcore​(java.lang.String cpe_file, java.lang.String[] cve_files, org.hibernate.SessionFactory sf)
      This method's purpose is to put all given CVE and CPE objects and related objects into database
      static void extendedDatabase​(java.lang.String cpe_file, java.lang.String[] cve_files, java.lang.String cwe_file, java.lang.String capec_file)
      This method's purpose is to put all given CVE, CWE and CAPEC objects and related objects into database It uses the extendedDBcore() method for this purpose
      static void extendedDBcore​(java.lang.String cpe_file, java.lang.String[] cve_files, java.util.List<CWEobject> cwe_objs, java.util.List<CAPECobject> capec_objs, java.util.List<CWEextRefObj> external_refs, org.hibernate.SessionFactory sf)
      This method's purpose is to put all given CVE, CWE and CAPEC objects and related objects into database
      static void filterUpdateQueryFile​(java.lang.String output_file)
      This method's purpose is to take file with logged SQL queries from quickUpdate, filter them and put them in right format into a new file (its path will be given in input)
      static void flushDB​(org.hibernate.SessionFactory sf)
      This method's purpose is to empty the database
      static org.hibernate.cfg.Configuration getConfiguration​(java.lang.Boolean update)
      This method's purpose is to create and return Configuration object with either basic or extended database structure
      static void quickUpdate​(java.lang.String update_file, java.lang.String output_file)
      This method's purpose is to quickly update CVE and CPE objects in the database It uses the quickUpdateCore() methods from CVEobject classes for this purpose It also exports all valuable SQL queries about database data change into file (its path is given in output_file argument)

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

        public NVDobject()

    • Method Detail

      • quickUpdate

        public static void quickUpdate​(java.lang.String update_file,
                               java.lang.String output_file)
        This method's purpose is to quickly update CVE and CPE objects in the database It uses the quickUpdateCore() methods from CVEobject classes for this purpose It also exports all valuable SQL queries about database data change into file (its path is given in output_file argument)
        Parameters:
        update_file - path to .json file with CVE objects - "modified" file containing recently changed data
        output_file - path to file that will be filled with all valuable SQL queries

      • basicDatabase

        public static void basicDatabase​(java.lang.String cpe_file,
                                 java.lang.String[] cve_files)
        This method's purpose is to put all given CVE and CPE objects and related objects into database It uses the basicDBcore() method for this purpose
        Parameters:
        cpe_file - path to .json file with CPE dictionary data (CPE match feed file)
        cve_files - paths to .json files with CVE objects

      • extendedDatabase

        public static void extendedDatabase​(java.lang.String cpe_file,
                                    java.lang.String[] cve_files,
                                    java.lang.String cwe_file,
                                    java.lang.String capec_file)
        This method's purpose is to put all given CVE, CWE and CAPEC objects and related objects into database It uses the extendedDBcore() method for this purpose
        Parameters:
        cpe_file - path to .json file with CPE dictionary data (CPE match feed file)
        cve_files - paths to .json files with CVE objects
        cwe_file - path to .xml file with CWE data
        capec_file - path to .xml file with CAPEC data

      • basicDBcore

        public static void basicDBcore​(java.lang.String cpe_file,
                               java.lang.String[] cve_files,
                               org.hibernate.SessionFactory sf)
        This method's purpose is to put all given CVE and CPE objects and related objects into database
        Parameters:
        cpe_file - path to .json file with CPE data (CPE match feed file)
        cve_files - paths to .json files with CVE objects
        sf - object needed to get hibernate Session Factory and to work with database

      • extendedDBcore

        public static void extendedDBcore​(java.lang.String cpe_file,
                                  java.lang.String[] cve_files,
                                  java.util.List<CWEobject> cwe_objs,
                                  java.util.List<CAPECobject> capec_objs,
                                  java.util.List<CWEextRefObj> external_refs,
                                  org.hibernate.SessionFactory sf)
        This method's purpose is to put all given CVE, CWE and CAPEC objects and related objects into database
        Parameters:
        cpe_file - path to .json file with CPE data (CPE match feed file)
        cve_files - paths to .json files with CVE objects
        cwe_objs - List of parsed CWE objects
        capec_objs - List of parsed CAPEC objects
        external_refs - List of parsed External Reference objects
        sf - object needed to get hibernate Session Factory and to work with database

      • flushDB

        public static void flushDB​(org.hibernate.SessionFactory sf)
        This method's purpose is to empty the database
        Parameters:
        sf - object needed to get hibernate Session Factory and to work with database

      • getConfiguration

        public static org.hibernate.cfg.Configuration getConfiguration​(java.lang.Boolean update)
        This method's purpose is to create and return Configuration object with either basic or extended database structure
        Parameters:
        update - tells if method is called by update method or not, if yes, turns on show sql property needed for getting valuable SQL queries
        Returns:
        Configuration object with current database structure

      • filterUpdateQueryFile

        public static void filterUpdateQueryFile​(java.lang.String output_file)
        This method's purpose is to take file with logged SQL queries from quickUpdate, filter them and put them in right format into a new file (its path will be given in input)
        Parameters:
        output_file - path to file that will be created and filled with ready SQL queries containing update data
